title: Concrete Jungle : A Pop Media Investigation of Death and Survival in Urban Ecosystems
description: Continuing in the tradition of the now-defunct RE/Search Publications of combining graphics and text, investigates what happens to organisms as they adapt to and thrive in our ecosystem. A collaboration by artists, theorists nd scientists, this book is a pop media investigation of what happens when urban and human environments intersect with nature. Photos and illustrations.
author: Alexis Rockman
